front.title: MNA for Performance Measurement with Alternate Marking Method

abstract.t: MPLS Network Action (MNA) is used to indicate action for Label Switched Paths (LSPs) and/or MPLS packets, and to transfer data needed for the action. This document defines MNA encoding for MPLS performance measurement with alternate marking method, which performs flow-based packet loss, delay, and jitter measurements on MPLS live traffic.
